languages.text: После общения с загадочной сущностью один из старших офицеров сгинул на мире в Зеркальной системе. Необходимо просканировать планету авгурами и отыскать пропавшего офицера. Если он еще жив.

traits.locale_text: После общения с загадочной сущностью один из старших офицеров сгинул во Тьме. Необходимо собрать чрезвычайный совет и разработать план по спасению.

languages.text: After contact with a mysterious entity, one of the senior officers has gone missing in System Speculo. Return to the voidship and scan the planet with the augurs to locate the lost officer. If it is not too late.
languages.original_text: После общения с загадочной сущностью один из старших офицеров сгинул на мире в Зеркальной системе. Необходимо просканировать планету авгурами и отыскать пропавшего офицера. Если он еще жив.

traits.locale_text: After contact with a mysterious entity, one of the senior officers has gone missing in System Speculo. An emergency council must be called and a rescue plan devised.
After contact with a mysterious entity, one of the senior officers has gone missing in System Speculo. An emergency council must be called and a rescue plan devised.
After contact with a mysterious entity, one of the senior officers has gone missing in System Speculo. An emergency council must be called and a rescue plan devised.

After contact with a mysterious entity, one of the senior officers has gone missing in System Speculo. Return to the voidship and scan the planet with the augurs to locate the lost officer. If it is not too late.

After contact with a mysterious entity, one of the senior officers has gone missing in System Speculo. Return to the voidship and scan the planet with the augurs to locate the lost officer. If it is not too late.

languages.text: 行商浪人在斯派克星系期间，某位高阶军官在与某个神秘实体接触之后便不知所踪。返回虚空舰，用俄歇矩阵扫描这颗行星，找到失踪的军官。希望一切还不算太迟。
languages.original_text: After contact with a mysterious entity, one of the senior officers has gone missing in System Speculo. Return to the voidship and scan the planet with the augurs to locate the lost officer. If it is not too late.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人在斯派克星系期间，某位高阶军官在与某个神秘实体解除之后便不知所踪。返回虚空舰，用俄歇矩阵扫描这颗行星，找到失踪的军官。希望一切还不算太迟。

languages.text: 謎の実体との接触後、上級士官の1人がスペキュロ星系で行方不明になった。ヴォイドシップに戻り、スキャナーで惑星をスキャンして行方不明の士官を見つけるのだ。手遅れでなければのことだが。
languages.original_text: After contact with a mysterious entity, one of the senior officers has gone missing in System Speculo. Return to the voidship and scan the planet with the augurs to locate the lost officer. If it is not too late.

traits.locale_text: 謎の実体との接触後、上級士官の1人がスペキュロ星系で行方不明になった。ヴォイドシップに戻り、スキャナーで惑星をスキャンして行方不明の士官を見つけるのだ。手遅れでなければのことだが。

languages.text: Tras entrar en contacto con una misteriosa entidad, uno de los oficiales veteranos ha desaparecido en el sistema Speculo. Vuelve a la nave y escanea el planeta con los augures para encontrar al oficial perdido... si no es muy tarde.
languages.original_text: After contact with a mysterious entity, one of the senior officers has gone missing in System Speculo. Return to the voidship and scan the planet with the augurs to locate the lost officer. If it is not too late.

traits.locale_text: Tras entrar en contacto con una misteriosa entidad, uno de los oficiales veteranos ha desaparecido en el sistema Speculo. Vuelve a la nave y escanea el planeta con los augures para encontrar al oficial perdido... si no es muy tarde.

languages.text: Nach dem Kontakt mit einer mysteriösen Wesenheit ist einer der leitenden Offiziere auf System Speculo verschwunden. Kehre zum Raumschiff zurück und scanne den Planeten mit den Auguren, um den Offizier aufzuspüren. Sofern es noch nicht zu spät ist.
languages.original_text: After contact with a mysterious entity, one of the senior officers has gone missing in System Speculo. Return to the voidship and scan the planet with the augurs to locate the lost officer. If it is not too late.

traits.locale_text: Nach dem Kontakt mit einer mysteriösen Wesenheit ist einer der leitenden Offiziere auf System Speculo verschwunden. Kehre zum Raumschiff zurück und scanne den Planeten mit den Auguren, um den Offizier aufzuspüren. Sofern es noch nicht zu spät ist.

languages.text: Après avoir pris contact avec une entité mystérieuse, l'un des officiers supérieurs a disparu dans le système de Speculo. Retourner au croiseur stellaire et scanner la planète avec les augures pour localiser l'officier perdu s'il n'est pas trop tard.
languages.original_text: After contact with a mysterious entity, one of the senior officers has gone missing in System Speculo. Return to the voidship and scan the planet with the augurs to locate the lost officer. If it is not too late.

traits.locale_text: Après avoir pris contact avec une entité mystérieuse, l'un des officiers supérieurs a disparu dans le système de Speculo. Retourner au croiseur stellaire et scanner la planète avec les augures pour localiser l'officier perdu s'il n'est pas trop tard.

languages.text: Gizemli bir varlıkla etkileşime geçen kıdemli subaylardan bir tanesi, Speculo Sistemi'nde kayboldu. Uçsuz gemisine dön ve alametlerle gezegeni tarayarak kayıp subayı tespit et. Geç kalmış olabiliriz.
languages.original_text: After contact with a mysterious entity, one of the senior officers has gone missing in System Speculo. Return to the voidship and scan the planet with the augurs to locate the lost officer. If it is not too late.

traits.locale_text: Gizemli bir varlıkla etkileşime geçen kıdemli subaylardan bir tanesi Speculo Sistemi'nde kayboldu. Uçsuz gemisine dön ve alametlerle gezegeni tarayarak kayıp subayı tespit et. Henüz çok geç kalmadıysak tabii.
